email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider $49.75 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $50.00 per ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $50.00 per ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Please confirm the demurrage terms and send over the recap for review. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Recap
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your confirmation. Attached is the recap for your review. Key details: Freight rate $50.00 per ton, laycan 15-20 October, demurrage $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if everything looks good, and we can proceed with the fixture. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Recap
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the recap looks good. We’ll proceed with the fixture as discussed. Please send over the final contract for signing. Thanks for your assistance throughout this process. Cheers, John.
